title: Veronica
writer: Paco Plaza, Fernando Navarro, Coral Cruz
short_cast: Sandra Escacena, Claudia Placer, Bruna González, Iván Chavero, Ana Torrent, Consuelo Trujillo
cast: Sandra Escacena, Claudia Placer, Bruna González, Iván Chavero, Ana Torrent, Consuelo Trujillo
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: In 1991 Madrid, after holding a séance at school, a teen girl minding her younger siblings at home suspects an evil force has entered their apartment.
